snippet.title: Endzone - A World Apart: Survivor Edition | Console Announcement Trailer | Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
☢️Coming May 19th, 2022 for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S!☢️ 
PSN: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10002515
MS Store: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/endzone-a-world-apart-survivor-edition/9PF7LBXW31QZ
Retail: https://www.amazon.de/Endzone-World-Apart-Survivor-PS5/dp/B09TNP45MW

Endzone Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/933820/
Endzone GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/endzone_a_world_apart
Prosperity Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1632320/Endzone__A_World_Apart_Prosperity/
Prosperity GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/endzone_a_world_apart_prosperity
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/worldofendzone
Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Ihy-ItrWqQH72FpcNQjGdw

🌳 Get the 'Save the World Edition' support the devs and help us plant trees: https://store.steampowered.com/sub/435296/

▬ Assemble Entertainment ▬▬▬▬▬
Shop: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/AssembleEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/assemble-entertainment
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/assembleteam
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/assembleteam
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/assembleteam/
Newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/assembleteam/assemble-newsletter
Website: http://www.assemble-entertainment.com/

▬ Endzone - A World Apart  ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WorldOfEndzone/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WorldOfEndzone
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/worldofendzone/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/endzone/
Website: http://endzone.game

▬ Gentlymad Studios ▬▬▬▬▬▬
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gentlymadstudios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gentlymadgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gentlymadstudios/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/gentlymadcompany
Website: https://gentlymad.org/

▬ About Endzone - A World Apart ▬▬
In 2021, a group of terrorists blew up nuclear power plants around the world and plunged the world into chaos. Only few were able to escape into underground facilities called "Endzones". 150 years later, mankind returns to the surface - under your command! In an extremely hostile environment full of radioactivity, contaminated rain and extreme climate change, you'll have to prove your worth as a leader. @WorldOfEndzone #EndzoneAWorldApart #CityBuilder

▬ Features ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
• Build a settlement on the hostile surface of the earth with over 70 different buildings and take care of your men, women and children.
• Gather & refine many different resources and manage your economy by building an efficient infrastructure with streets and depositories.
• Experience dynamically simulated, believable environments! Every ground cell in the game has its own humidity and radiation values.
• Survive in a world of constant threats including radioactively contaminated ground, droughts, toxic rain and sandstorms.
• Send expeditions to forgotten places and make meaningful decisions that change the fate of your people.
• Experience a living settlement and fulfill side missions to cater for your settlers needs.
• A variety of challenging scenarios with specific winning conditions and a distinct storyline will put your survival skills to the test.
• And many more features coming during our early access/in development phase...

▬ Assemble Entertainment ▬▬▬▬▬▬
Founded in 2016 and based in Wiesbaden, Germany, Assemble Entertainment is an independent games developer best known for the survival city-builder Endzone - A World Apart, that challenges players to survive and thrive following an environmental apocalypse, and the modernized Leisure Suit Larry series, featuring two new entries in the iconic decades-spanning saga. Despite the company's short history, Assemble Entertainment has won the German Developer Award twice — in 2020 and 2021— in the category "Best Publisher”. Assemble Entertainment organizes GermanDevDays, an annual conference held in Frankfurt, Germany since 2016 that attracts more than 1,100 attendees from across the German-speaking video game development industry. The event also includes the GermanDevDays Indie Award, where indie development teams across Germany can participate in varying categories to win a cash prize for their projects. The event is hosted by Stefan Marcinek, CEO and Founder of Assemble Entertainment. More on http://www.assemble-entertainment.com/ #AssembleEntertainment

▬ More Links ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Livestream: https://www.twitch.tv/assembleentertainment
Assemble Discord: https://discord.com/invite/assemble-entertainment
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/assemble-entertainment/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AssembleEntertainment/

▬ More Games  ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Leisure Suit Larry – Wet Dreams Don’t Dry: https://youtu.be/c-6WyjEJFVk?list=PLEM2iueadJ3KRexrNB03Ocpz-cGNeHVaB
Lacuna: https://youtu.be/sWh4Fzv7vLE?list=PLEM2iueadJ3Klskv1WdlD2uew01TMX6KB
Orbital Bullet: https://youtu.be/hS5TBMEHYlQ?list=PLEM2iueadJ3KoD1PoEF2hSDp5-NvGLhyC
ITORAH: https://youtu.be/CPJvHciJpwY?list=PLEM2iueadJ3J51klutPCVfYV1QjcE8-xE
